metadata.creator: BILLY JONES AND ERNEST HARE
Edgar Leslie
Charles O'Flynn
Larry Vincent
metadata.description:
Performer: BILLY JONES AND ERNEST HARE
Writer: Edgar Leslie; Charles O'Flynn; Larry Vincent

(The Happiness Boys).

Digitized at 80 revolutions per minute. Four stylii were used to transfer this record. They are 0.7mil E, Nonemil None, Nonemil None, Nonemil None. These were recorded flat and then also equalized with Turnover: 0, Rolloff: 0.

The preferred versions suggested by an audio engineer at George Blood, L.P. have been copied to have the more friendly filenames.

Matrix number: 10426-C-3-1
Catalog number: 51577-R

Other IDs from the record include: 10426
metadata.notes:
The recording on the other side of this disc: THE KING ISN'T KING ANY MORE.

Technical Notes: Vertical-cut acoustic; 1 stylus captured; distortion; swishing
metadata.subject: LP
Comic Song
metadata.title: THE FARMER TOOK ANOTHER LOAD AWAY! HAY! HAY!
